sentences.sContent: Went in to a laundry to wash my clothes down.
sentences.sContent_eng: Went in to a laundry to wash my clothes down.
sentences.sCn: 走进一家洗衣店去清洗我的衣服。

sentences.sContent: She can wash my clothes clean no matter how dirty they are.
sentences.sContent_eng: She can wash my clothes clean no matter how dirty they are.
sentences.sCn: 她总是能把我的衣服洗的干干净净，无论它们有多脏。

sentences.sContent: Thank you for walking me through how to wash my clothes on my phone over the phone. I know I should have learned earlier.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thank you for walking me through how to wash my clothes on my phone over the phone. I know I should have learned earlier.
sentences.sCn: 感谢您在电话里指导我怎么洗衣服。我知道我应该早点学的。
